job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of integrating AI functionalities into existing or new application architectures, spanning both front-end and back-end.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights understanding user needs and aligning technical output with business/educational goals and market standards.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the traditional software engineering practice of building and integrating application components.

job_tasks.phrase: with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI into the application to improve user experience, a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core task of leveraging specific AI technologies (LLMs) to build new functionalities and features.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This describes end-to-end software development responsibility, encompassing the full lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs
job_tasks.justification: This highlights understanding business needs and stakeholder alignment to deliver effective solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts.
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes collaboration with diverse teams and stakeholders.

job_tasks.phrase: Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions the importance of communication skills for the role.

job_tasks.phrase: continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the need for continuous learning and staying updated with new technologies in the AI and web development fields.

job_tasks.phrase: You will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the practical application of full-stack development skills to bring abstract ideas to fruition.

job_tasks.phrase: translating high-level ideas into fully developed products
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding business needs and translating them into concrete technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications
job_tasks.justification: This is a core software development task focused on creating applications.

job_tasks.phrase: that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency
job_tasks.justification: This links the technical output to specific business/educational outcomes and efficiency gains.

profile.rationale: The role requires building AI-powered web applications, integrating front-end and back-end systems, and specifically working with LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude to create new features. This demonstrates a balanced mix of core software engineering tasks (Macro-Category A) and GenAI specialization tasks (Macro-Category B), with a clear focus on Generative AI technologies. The emphasis on ownership, innovation, and continuous learning further supports this profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is exceptionally clear and detailed, providing specific examples of tasks and technologies. The responsibilities align well with the defined profiles, making the classification straightforward.
